column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I hope this gives more clarity on your order
column2: and I hope it doesn't deter you from future visits. But if you do come through again
column3: please ask for Keith. Remind him of your Yelp review
column4: and he will make certain everything is to your utmost satisfaction. We owe you a seasoned egg
column5: and we can easily reimburse you for that with your next order.
